name: Chronobauble
desc: Slow enemies on hit for -60% movement speed for 2s (+2s per stack) .
notes:
The Chronobauble is an item in Risk of Rain 2. 
When the holder damages an enemy, that enemy is   slowed by 60% for 2 seconds (+2 seconds per stack). 


== Notes ==
Unlike many other on-hit debuff effects, the Chronobauble is completely unaffected by the hit's proc coefficient. The slowness debuff will always have the same duration when inflicted, regardless of the attack.
Since this item only affects movement speed and not attack speed, this item's benefits are negligible on enemies that use ranged attacks.
The slow effect can be used to keep close-range enemies such as   Imps at a distance, or to activate the  Death Mark.
Some other close range enemies include   Blind Vermin and   Mithrix.
